author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Novartis Announces NEJM Publication Of Updated Analysis From Eliana Trial Showing Longer-Term Durable Remissions With Kymriah In Children, Young Adults With R/R ALL
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Novartis AG:
* NOVARTIS ANNOUNCES NEJM PUBLICATION OF UPDATED ANALYSIS FROM ELIANA TRIAL SHOWING LONGER-TERM DURABLE REMISSIONS WITH KYMRIAH™ IN CHILDREN, YOUNG ADULTS WITH R/R ALL
* NOVARTIS AG - ‍IN ANALYSIS OF 75 INFUSED PATIENTS WITH 3 OR MORE MONTHS OF FOLLOW-UP, KYMRIAH DEMONSTRATED AN OVERALL REMISSION RATE OF 81%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
